item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: Currently Reading Books Dopamine Nation - Dr Anna Lembke - [Link] Halo Data - Caroline Carruthers & Peter Jackson [Link] The Checklist Manifesto: How To Get Things Right - Atul Gawande [Link] Papers & Articles Simple tools for mastering color in scientific figures Completed Aug 2024 Man’s Search for Meaning - Victor E Frankl - [Link] This is an amazing book written soon after WW2 and his release from a concentration camp.
